title: jagadbhi rAmA
sahitya:
jagadabhi rAmA jAnakI rAmA


anupallavi

  agaNita nAmA ambuda shyAmA rakula sOmA rAkSasa bhImA


caraNam 1    purahara mitra puNya caritra suranuti pAtra sundara gAtra
    caraNam 2    kara dhrta shApa khaNDita pApa narvara rUpA nammija nAbhA
    caraNam 3    shrIsha gOpAla dAsAnukUla bhUsutA lOlA budhajana pAla
